title: Find Maximum in Array
description: Write a function 'findMax' that accepts an array of numbers and returns the maximum number in the array.

title: Reverse String
description: Write a function 'reverseString' that accepts a string and returns the string reversed.

title: Sum Array
description: Write a function 'sumArray' that accepts an array of numbers and returns the sum of all the numbers in the array.

title: Palindrome Checker
description: Write a function 'isPalindrome' that accepts a string and returns true if the string is a palindrome (reads the same forward and backward), and false otherwise.

title: Factorial Calculation
description: Write a function 'factorial' that accepts a number and returns the factorial of that number. The factorial of a non-negative integer n is the product of all positive integers less than or equal to n.
